title: Strengthening Learning Design Competencies: Improving Mathematical Reasoning Through Inquiry-Based Discussion Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can construct evidence-based arguments for given math problems with over 80% accuracy
Learners improve the validity of argument structures by over 70% through revising and supplementing their arguments based on peer feedback
Learners improve their ability to logically analyze counterarguments and present refuting evidence by over 50% compared to pre-assessment
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
